channel.title: In God we trust. All others bring data. on Chidili Oscar
channel.description: Recent content in In God we trust. All others bring data. on Chidili Oscar

item.title: Credit Card Fraud Detection (Logistic regression Model)
item.description: The use of NumPy, pandas, matplotlib and seaborn aided the project scope. Data exploration to summarize the total number of fraud and not fraud transactions. Split data into training and test set data and choose features and target variable used for the selected logistic regression model. Fitted a logistic regression model to the training data using an optimization algorithm Usingmetrics such as accuracy, precision, recall, and F1 score to evaluate the model’s performance.

item.title: Extracting and Visualizing Stock Data
item.description: The stock data of Tesla and GameStop is collected using two methods: yfinance to extract stock data and webscraping to extract revenue data. The stock data is then used to create two graphs, one for Tesla stock and one for GameStop stock. Extracting Tesla stock information using the ticker object and history function, resetting the index, displaying the first five rows of the dataframe, and taking a screenshot of the results and code.

item.title: About
item.description: With all the unfortunate downfalls in many industries and sectors, I have always wondered if we could predict such things. I came across the importance of data and analyzing it to predict future outcomes. I have held data science positions and worked on projects. I transitioned from a business and health background. No matter how complex the data or challenging the business needs, my passion for data science never wanes.
